text:
Putnam Exam | 2018: A2

Putnam Exam [imath] 12018: A 2 [/imath]\n[imath]m_{i j}=\left\{\begin{array}{ll}\n0 & \text { if } S_{i} \cap S_{j}=\emptyset \\\n1 & \text { otherwise }\n\end{array}\right.[/imath][imath]0 & \text { if } S_{i} \cap S_{j}=\emptyset [/imath] [imath]1 & \text { otherwise }[/imath]
